title: Micronutrients That Support Strength and Endurance
description: While macronutrients get the spotlight, vitamins and minerals are equally critical for energy metabolism, muscle contraction, and overall fitness performance.

sections.title: Essential Micronutrients for Athletes
sections.content: Iron supports oxygen transport, calcium strengthens bones, and magnesium aids in muscle function. Deficiencies can impair performance and increase injury risk.

sections.title: Best Food Sources
sections.content: Leafy greens, nuts, seeds, dairy, lean meats, and fortified cereals provide a wide variety of essential vitamins and minerals.
